name: Meadows_Fabrics
description: Find all patterns in level 1 - You have found all the hidden patterns spread throughout the soft green meadows.

name: Hills_Fabrics
description: Find all patterns in level 2 - You have found all the hidden patterns hidden in between the steep pink cliffs.

name: Beach_Fabrics
description: Find all patterns in level 3 - You have found all the hidden patterns scattered across the beach.

name: Jungle_Fabrics
description: Find all patterns in level 4 - You have found all the hidden patterns that were obscured in the jungle.

name: Desert_Fabrics
description: Find all patterns in level 5 - You have found all the hidden patterns that remained in the desert.

name: Meadows_Animals
description: Find all blueprints in level 1 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the soft meadows.

name: Hills_Animals
description: Find all blueprints in level 2 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the cliffs.

name: Beach_Animals
description: Find all blueprints in level 3 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the beach.

name: Jungle_Animals
description: Find all blueprints in level 4 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the jungle.

name: Desert_Animals
description: Find all blueprints in level 5 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the desert.

name: Meadows_Memories
description: Find all memories in level 1 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the meadows.

name: Hills_Memories
description: Find all memories in level 2 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the cliffs.

name: Beach_Memories
description: Find all memories in level 3 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the beach.

name: Jungle_Memories
description: Find all memories in level 4 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the jungle.

name: Desert_Memories
description: Find all memories in level 5 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the desert.

name: Meadows_Caves
description: Find all caves in level 1 - You have explored all the caves of the meadows, old drawings of a long time ago, when Stuffy’s once lived in peace in these parts.

name: Hills_Caves
description: Find all caves in level 2 - You have explored all the caves of the cliffs, and discovered about the things that are and the things that aren’t.

name: Beach_Caves
description: Find all caves in level 3 - You have explored all the caves of the beach, and discovered about the journey.

name: Jungle_Caves
description: Find all caves in level 4 - You have explored all the caves of the jungle, the most recent paintings made and discovered about the times of woe.

name: Desert_Caves
description: Find all caves in level 5 - You have explored all the caves of the desert, the oldest of all, and discovered about what once was, and then wasn’t.

name: All_Fabrics
description: In a single playthrough, find all patterns in the game! - On this journey, you have collected all the patterns in the world of Woven, the good, the bad, and the downright unfashionable ones too. You are a true collector.

name: All_Animals
description: In a single playthrough, find all blueprints in the game! - On this journey, you have salvaged all the animal blueprints that were scattered over the world, giving Glitch the precious knowledge of how to shape these creatures.You are a saviour of this knowledge.

name: All_Memories
description: In a single playthrough, find all memories in the game! - On this journey, you have retrieved all the memories that were scattered across the land, a long long time ago. Giving a glimpse of a glimpse of the knowledge lost. Thanks to you, Glitch has regained his identity. You now know what must be done.

name: All_Caves
description: In a single playthrough, find all caves in the game! - On this Journey, you have retraced the steps of the Stuffies and found all their cave drawings. You have lived their journey. Are you ready to undertake that final step?
